name: wield
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to hold a weapon or tool and look as if you are going to use it
trans_examp.trans_cn: 挥舞，握，抓着（武器或工具）

example.eg: She was confronted by a man wielding a knife.
example.egtrans: 她受到一名持刀男子的威胁。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to have a lot of influence or power over other people
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 施加影响／运用权力（等等）

example.eg: He still wields enormous influence in politics.
example.egtrans: 他在政坛仍然很有影响。
